  • Constructor Details

    • MatchleScorer

      public MatchleScorer(Corpus corpus)

  • Method Details

    • score

      public long score(NGram key, NGram guess)
      Computes the score for a given key/guess pair using a parallel stream. The score is defined as the count of NGrams in the corpus that are consistent with the feedback filter generated by comparing the key and guess.
      Parameters:
      key - the target NGram
      guess - the guessed NGram
      Returns:
      the score as a long value
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if key or guess is null

    • scoreWorstCase

      public long scoreWorstCase(NGram guess)
      Computes the worst-case score for a given guess, defined as the maximum score over all possible keys in the corpus.
      Parameters:
      guess - the guessed NGram
      Returns:
      the worst-case score
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if guess is null

    • scoreAverageCase

      public long scoreAverageCase(NGram guess)
      Computes the average-case score for a given guess, defined as the sum of the scores over all keys in the corpus.
      Parameters:
      guess - the guessed NGram
      Returns:
      the average-case score
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if guess is null

    • bestGuess

      public NGram bestGuess(ToLongFunction<NGram> criterion)
      Finds and returns the NGram from the corpus that minimizes the given scoring criterion.
      Parameters:
      criterion - a ToLongFunction that defines the score for a guess
      Returns:
      the best guess NGram or null if none found
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if criterion is null

    • bestWorstCaseGuess

      public NGram bestWorstCaseGuess()
      Returns the best guess according to worst-case scoring.
      Returns:
      the best NGram guess minimizing the worst-case score

    • bestAverageCaseGuess

      public NGram bestAverageCaseGuess()
      Returns the best guess according to average-case scoring.
      Returns:
      the best NGram guess minimizing the average-case score
